# Installation, Repair, and Moving Services for Vancouver Region

**Reference Number**: CB-6620-48496124
**Amendment Number**: 1
**Solicitation Number**: 1000244533-A
**Publication Date**: June 22, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: July 14, 2023, 2:00 p.m. (Pacific Time)

## Description

The Indigenous Services Canada (ISC), British Columbia Region, seeks a contractor to provide installation, repair, and moving services for owned and leased furniture and equipment within the British Columbia Region on an ‘as and when required basis’.

## Required Location

Services are required at the following location:

* 1138 Melville Street, Vancouver, BC V6E 4S3

## Scope of Work

* Installation, repair, and moving of owned and leased furniture and equipment
* Removal of surplus, e-waste, and recycling, and delivery to Crown Assets, recycling depot, and/or landfill within the Greater Vancouver Area

## Contract Term

The Standing Offer Agreement (SOA) will be for a period of three (3) years, with an additional two (2) one-year option periods under the same terms and conditions.

## Evaluation Criteria

Bidders will be evaluated based on the Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price.

## Important Dates

* Tender Closing Date: July 14, 2023, 2:00 p.m. (Pacific Time)
* Expected Contract Start Date: August 1, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2026

## Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

* Christine Madore, Indigenous Services Canada
* Email: [christine.madore@sac-isc.gc.ca](mailto:christine.madore@sac-isc.gc.ca)
* Phone: (873) 354-1376
